Package fcatools.conexpng.gui Description

This package contains all GUI-related classes.

Each class roughly corresponds to a visible GUI component.

The code adheres to the following style.

  • Actions and ActionMaps are preferred over ActionListeners.
  • ChangeListeners and PropertyChangeListeners are preferred over Observers and Observables.
In general, the recommendations from the following links are followed:
  • Java AWT/SWT/Swing: How to plan a GUI?
  • Java/Swing GUI best practices
